wiki.content:
4th and longest composition off of Davis' famous LP Kind of Blue.
 
 First solo: Davis
 Second solo: Adderley
 Third solo: Coltrane
 Fourth solo: Evans
        
User-contributed text is available under the Creative Commons By-SA License and may also be available under the GNU FDL.
wiki.summary:
4th and longest composition off of Davis' famous LP Kind of Blue.  First solo: Davis
 Second solo: Adderley
 Third solo: Coltrane
 Fourth solo: Evans

name: All Blues
comments: All jazz
This whole album is truely incredble. Great listen to in the morning
this is a great song to climb trees with on long summer days and eat leaves
cool
lol. This started playing in my earbuds and I looked around to see what was being dug up behind me on my right.
Hope to get all of Kind of Blue played at my funeral.
i love this track
check out Urbanator's version
Miles ha creado un universo, dueño de su propia galaxia. Salud. maestro!!
Just about how i felt!
There are other artists I like more than Miles, but this album's greatness can't be denied.
Surely on of the best jazz tracks ever.
This is it....Even though this song is kind of mainstream today - it is still the coolest number...and very sophisticated. Kind of Blue would be the one record to take with me on an island ;-)
my first jazz album...from back in middle school!! Still love it to this day!
The all time classic from the all time classic by the all time classic inimitable Miles superb timeless cool blue and at least fifty five years ago!!!!!
Love :)
last one tonight
Theme from Lester Freamon!
Tri kineska s kontrabasom, sjedio na ulici i rekli jedni drugima što. Onda je došao u policiju, pa što je ovo? Tri kineska s basom.
